sprache.help_fdl:
Fastdownload allows the players to download server data such as sounds and maps at a much faster rate.

You can either use a default Fastdownload server which will be used for all game servers or you configure individual Fastdownload servers for each game servers.

Clicking the Start FastDL Sync button will initiate the FastDL sync process and automatically upload all required files to the Fastdownload server. Furthermore, you need to add the according HTTP URL in the server's server.cfg or dedicated.cfg file to activate Fastdownload.
sprache.neben: FTP data used for the Fastdownload server
